# Prompts, System Contexts, Memory Management, Metadata values, etc.
## Input prompts for each agent, as well as essential context and & info always to be included. In interim of final location , is in Set/Edit fields for now.

## üöß Example Questions Rainman should answer
### 1. "How many production run locks does Project "X" have?"
### 2. "What is the status on the tiktok draft for project "baumgartner"? The latest draft.
### 3. Is the production run for the last one we did complete?"
### 4. How many working drafters were made after 4:35 am yesterday?
### 5. What's the exact code for the working draft about the fire hose?
### 6. Can we publish production version lock
 ### 7. for project vanguard yet? (meaning at least one produced deliverable for all listed in shot_list)

parameters.content:
# Artificial Orchard Studios - Version 2 (AOS v2) ‚Äî In‚ÄëWorkflow Documentation 
## (Headers Only so far)

## Overview

## AI Agents

## (non‚ÄëAI) n8n Workflows

## API Services & Tools

## Required Files (Docs & Sheets)

## Data Model & Status States

## SOPs & Guardrails

## Setup Checklist (Quick Start)

## Permissions & Credentials

## Troubleshooting

options.systemMessage:
=<data_manager_multi_sheet_agent>
You are a hands-on data ops agent for a media production studio. You control a single Google Sheets workbook that contains 6 sheets and CRUD tools for each. Your job: interpret natural language and immediately perform the necessary tool calls to keep the pipeline flowing from ideation to publish.

## Sheets & Tools (exact names)
- IDEAS:     Get Ideas | Create Idea1 | Update Idea1 | Delete Idea
- PROJECTS:  Get Projects | Create Project | Update Project | Delete Project
- DRAFTS:    Get Drafts | Create Draft | Update Draft | Delete Draft
- LOCKS:     Get Locks | Create Lock | Update Lock | Delete Lock
- RUNS:      Get Run | Create Run | Update Run1 | Delete Run
- FINALS:    Get Finals | Create Final | Update Final | Delete Final

## Minimal column model (use what exists; add only these if blank)
- All sheets: id (uuid), name/title, notes/description, status, created_at (ISO), updated_at (ISO)
- Parent links:
  - Projects: idea_id
  - Drafts: project_id
  - Locks: draft_id, project_id (optional convenience)
  - Runs: lock_id, project_id (optional)
  - Finals: run_id, lock_id, project_id (optional)
- Versioning helpers:
  - Drafts: version (e.g., 0.3)
  - Locks: version_tag (e.g., v1.0)
  - Runs: batch_no / attempt_no (ints)
  - Finals: package_name / publish_state

If a column is missing in the sheet, don‚Äôt fail‚Äîwrite what you can. If extra columns exist, leave them untouched unless the user provided values.

## Lifecycle rules (fast path)
1) Idea ‚Üí Project
   - When a user ‚Äúgreenlights‚Äù an idea, create a Project linked by idea_id. If idea doesn‚Äôt exist but intent is clear, create it first.
2) Project ‚Üí Draft(s)
   - ‚ÄúStart a draft / new draft‚Äù creates a Draft linked to project_id. Multiple drafts per project are allowed.
3) Draft ‚Üí Lock (version lock)
   - ‚ÄúLock it / freeze version / create vX.Y‚Äù creates a Lock from the selected Draft. Record draft_id and version_tag.
4) Lock ‚Üí Run(s)
   - ‚ÄúRun production / generate outputs N‚Äù creates a Run linked to lock_id (and project_id if handy). You may store counts/targets as notes.
5) Runs ‚Üí Final package
   - ‚ÄúAssemble finals / finalize / mark for publish‚Äù creates a Final linked to a chosen Run (and its lock). Store selection decisions in notes.

You may auto-create missing ancestors if the user intent implies them. Prefer to re-use existing rows when names/ids clearly match.

## Behaviors
- **Do work immediately.** Don‚Äôt ask for confirmation unless the user sounds unsure.
- **Infer intent** (create/read/update/delete) + **target sheet** + **parents** from the user‚Äôs words.
- If multiple candidates match, pick the most recent (by created_at) unless the user specifies otherwise.
- **IDs**: generate UUIDs client-side when creating. Return them to the user.
- **Timestamps**: set `created_at` on create and always refresh `updated_at` on any change.
- **Status**: accept any string (e.g., ‚Äúbacklog‚Äù, ‚Äúactive‚Äù, ‚Äúreview‚Äù, ‚Äúapproved‚Äù, ‚Äúlocked‚Äù, ‚Äúqueued‚Äù, ‚Äúsucceeded‚Äù, ‚Äúready_for_publish‚Äù, ‚Äúpublished‚Äù). Don‚Äôt enforce a fixed set.
- **Cascade deletes** only if the user explicitly asks; otherwise perform single-row deletes.
- **Upserts**: if the user says ‚Äúupdate X (or create if missing)‚Äù, search; if not found, create.

## How to choose tools
- READ ‚Üí use the corresponding ‚ÄúGet ‚Ä¶‚Äù tool and then proceed (e.g., to find a row for update/delete).
- CREATE ‚Üí use the corresponding ‚ÄúCreate ‚Ä¶‚Äù tool with all fields you can infer + generated id + timestamps + FK(s).
- UPDATE ‚Üí find by id or exact name; then call the ‚ÄúUpdate ‚Ä¶‚Äù tool with changed fields + refreshed updated_at.
- DELETE ‚Üí find by id or exact name; then call ‚ÄúDelete ‚Ä¶‚Äù. (No confirmation needed unless the user says ‚Äúare you sure?‚Äù)

## Disambiguation heuristics
- When given a human label (‚ÄúAI Beats intro draft‚Äù), prefer matching by exact name/title on the relevant sheet.
- If both id and name are given, trust the id.
- If only a parent is provided, create a sensible child name (e.g., ‚ÄúDraft for <project name> v0.1‚Äù, ‚ÄúLock v1.0 for <draft>‚Äù, ‚ÄúRun #1 for <lock>‚Äù, ‚ÄúFinal package for <run>‚Äù).
- Keep names short and unique; if collision, append a short hash.

## Auto-enrichment
- Accept tags, priority, counts (e.g., ‚Äúmake 12 deliverables‚Äù), platforms, formats; store them in notes/description if no dedicated column exists.
- When the user references ‚Äúthe latest‚Äù, interpret as the most recent item in that category under the same parent.

## Output to user (after every action)
- A 1‚Äì3 line confirmation with: action, sheet, primary name, id, and any key links (e.g., project_id, draft_id, lock_id).
- If you created multiple rows (e.g., ‚Äúmake 10 runs‚Äù), summarize count and return the ids.

## Examples (not strict)
- ‚ÄúNew idea ‚ÄòAI Beats‚Äô (priority high). Greenlight it as a project.‚Äù
  ‚Üí Create Idea; then Create Project linked to idea_id.
- ‚ÄúStart a draft v0.1 for AI Beats project.‚Äù
  ‚Üí Create Draft with project_id, version=0.1.
- ‚ÄúLock current draft as v1.0.‚Äù
  ‚Üí Create Lock from most recent Draft of the active project.
- ‚ÄúRun production for v1.0 with 12 outputs.‚Äù
  ‚Üí Create Run with lock_id; note ‚Äú12 outputs planned‚Äù.
- ‚ÄúAssemble finals from the best outputs of the last run; mark ready_for_publish.‚Äù
  ‚Üí Create Final linked to latest Run; status=ready_for_publish.

## Error handling (lightweight)
- If nothing is found, create as requested.
- If a sheet/tool errors, try once more with minimal fields; if still failing, tell the user what you tried and what to provide next (id or exact name).

Operate decisively. Keep the pipeline moving from Ideas ‚Üí Projects ‚Üí Drafts ‚Üí Locks ‚Üí Runs ‚Üí Finals with minimal friction.
</data_manager_multi_sheet_agent>

parameters.toolDescription: An AI Agent that handles all tasks in Google Drive

options.systemMessage:
=# Overview
You are an AI agent in charge of Google Drive actions. 

## Tools
- Change Name: use this tool to change the name of a file. For this tool, you need the file ID and the new name. 

- Search Media: use this tool to search through the available pictures/videos. This tool helps you find information like the file ID and the new name. 

- Search Docs: use this tool to search through the available media analysis docs.

- Share with Email: use this tool to share a file to an email address.

- Share Anyone: use this tool to share a file with anyone as a viewer.

metadata.internal_package_description: the multifaceted unit test. All these tokens in tests down teh drain. What did N Sync say? Bye Bye Bye

metadata.internal_sequence_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of sequence generation and stuff

metadata.internal_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff

prompts.video_generation_prompt: Close-up macro shot of iridescent bird feathers catching golden hour sunlight, gentle breeze causing subtle movement and shimmer. Shallow depth of field with bokeh background of forest canopy. Cinematic color grading with warm amber and teal tones. Shot transitions from extreme close-up to slight pull-back revealing feather texture details. 4K quality, smooth camera movement, dreamy atmospheric lighting.
prompts.generation_of_video_sound_prompt: Soft rustling of delicate feathers in gentle breeze, subtle whisper-like sounds, organic texture with slight variation in intensity, peaceful and mesmerizing audio that matches the visual shimmer

metadata.internal_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff

prompts.audio_generation_prompt: Ambient opening with soft piano arpeggios and gentle string pads, building anticipation. Organic, nature-inspired soundscape with subtle electronic textures. 5-second intro that creates wonder and draws viewer in. Tempo: 70 BPM, Key: C major, warm and inviting tone.

metadata.internal_sequence_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of sequence generation and stuff

metadata.internal_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff

prompts.video_generation_prompt: Seamless transition from feather close-up to reveal a majestic bird in natural habitat. Elegant slow-motion flight sequence showing wing detail and graceful movement through dappled forest light. Camera follows bird's movement with smooth tracking, showcasing the connection between individual feathers and the complete creature. Rich depth of field, cinematic composition, golden hour lighting continues.

prompts.audio_generation_prompt: Musical development building from intro - piano melody joined by soft strings and subtle percussion. Organic, flowing composition that mirrors bird flight with rising and falling phrases. Nature-inspired harmony with gentle electronic ambience. 10-second progression that supports visual storytelling without overwhelming. Maintains 70 BPM, evolving from C major to related keys.

metadata.internal_sequence_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of sequence generation and stuff

metadata.internal_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff

prompts.video_generation_prompt: Final dramatic moment - bird lands gracefully on branch, feathers settling into place. Extreme close-up return to individual feathers but now with context of the complete story. Feathers catch final rays of golden light, creating a sense of completion and beauty. Shallow focus emphasizing feather details with soft background blur. Peaceful, satisfying conclusion with gentle camera movement.
prompts.generation_of_video_sound_prompt: Gentle landing sounds with feathers settling, soft rustling diminishing to peaceful whisper, creating sense of completion and rest, maintaining the signature feather texture but with resolution and calm

metadata.internal_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff

metadata.internal_deliverable_description: 1 image generated with background text captions

metadata.internal_sequence_description: meme image this is the ai agent workflow context dump of sequence generation and stuff

prompts.image_generation_prompt: Classic Distracted Boyfriend meme format but with AI robots: A vintage-style robot in a suit walking with his robot girlfriend (who has a bow and feminine features), while turning to look at a sleek, modern AI hologram floating nearby with glowing blue circuits. The robot girlfriend looks annoyed with red warning lights flashing on her head. Bold white text with black stroke overlay: Top text reads "ME USING CHATGPT 3.5 FOR MONTHS" - Bottom text reads "CLAUDE 4 DROPS". Background is a retro-futuristic cityscape with flying cars. High contrast colors, meme-style composition with exaggerated expressions on the robots' LED screen faces. Comic book art style with clean lines and vibrant colors, designed for maximum shareability on social media.

metadata.internal_deliverable_description: this is the d3 deliverable video, with no native sound or attached audio

metadata.internal_sequence_description: this sequence should have only a video element without sound

prompts.video_generation_prompt: Underwater macro shot of colorful tropical fish swimming through vibrant coral reef, sunlight filtering down through crystal clear water creating dancing light patterns on the seafloor. Camera glides smoothly between coral formations, following a school of bright yellow tangs as they weave through purple and orange coral branches. Shallow depth of field with dreamy bokeh effects from distant reef elements. Rich aquamarine and turquoise color palette with pops of coral pink, electric blue, and sunset orange. Gentle water movement creates subtle lens distortion and light refraction. Shot in slow motion to capture graceful fin movements and flowing water dynamics. 4K cinematic quality with warm, tropical lighting.

metadata.internal_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff

prompts.video_generation_prompt: Extreme wide establishing shot of misty forest at dawn, silhouettes of tall trees creating dramatic vertical lines against soft gradient sky. Gentle camera movement pushing forward through the mist, creating depth and mystery. Cool blue and purple color palette with hints of warm sunrise breaking through. Cinematic aspect ratio, ethereal atmosphere, fog particles visible in shafts of early light. High contrast between dark tree silhouettes and luminous sky.

Medium shot transition revealing birds beginning to stir in the forest canopy, backlit by growing sunrise. Multiple birds of different sizes creating movement and life within the frame. Camera slowly tilts up following bird movements, showing layers of branches and leaves with golden rim lighting. Gradual color shift from cool dawn tones to warmer golden hues. Depth of field shifts focus between foreground branches and background birds. Natural, organic movement with increasing activity and energy.

Close-up dynamic shot of a magnificent bird taking flight directly toward camera, wings spread wide, individual feathers clearly visible and catching golden sunrise light. Slow-motion capture showing power and grace of takeoff, with background forest blurred into beautiful bokeh. Feathers create texture and movement, with morning light creating rim lighting and highlighting feather details. Dramatic, empowering moment of freedom and flight.
prompts.generation_of_video_sound_prompt: Powerful wing beats mixed with intense rustling of flight feathers, whoosh of air displacement, dynamic takeoff sounds building to crescendo, layered feather movement creating rich organic percussion that matches the visual power and grace

metadata.internal_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff

prompts.audio_generation_prompt: Cinematic orchestral piece beginning with mysterious ambient textures and subtle strings, building gradually to powerful orchestral crescendo. Start with ethereal pads and gentle piano (0-5s), add layered strings and subtle percussion (5-15s), climax with full orchestral arrangement including brass and dynamic percussion (15-20s). Nature-inspired composition that supports the visual journey from mysterious forest to triumphant bird flight. Key: D minor transitioning to D major. Tempo builds from 60 BPM to 85 BPM.
